item.description:
Instead of our planned road trip to New Jersey, Phyllis has suggested we head up to Westfield for a Patsy Cline tribute concert!

Concert is 6:00 to 8:00 PM. Those interested in carpooling from Windsor should meet at Gloria's at 5:15. Bring a picnic or we can grab a bite to eat on the way home.

Stanley Park -- Beveridge Pavilion
400 Western Avenue
Westfield, Massachusetts 01085
Phone: (413)568-9312


How to get to the park.

MASS Pike EAST or WEST

On the Massachusetts turnpike, you need to get off at EXIT 3 - which is the WESTFIELD/NORTHAMPTON exit. TURN RIGHT on to Routes 10 and 202 SOUTH.

Continue on Routes 10 and 202 SOUTH for 2 miles until you reach the center of Westfield. A rotary will be on your left, and the Westfield Library will be on your right. Take a RIGHT onto Court Street. Continue for about 1 mile Court Street will turn into Western Avenue. The Main Entrance to Stanley Park is on the LEFT.

South or North on Rt. 91

On Rt. 91, continue into Springfield/West Springfield. Take Rt.20 West. Follow Rt.20 West to the center of Westfield. There will be a Rotary on your left. Go 1/4 way around it. You will see the Westfield Library on your right. Take a RIGHT onto Court Street. Continue for about 1 mile Court Street will turn into Western Avenue. The Main Entrance to Stanley Park is on the LEFT.
item.name: Patsy Cline!
